#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cassert>

using namespace std;

int main(int argc, const char * argv[]) {
    int testCases;
    cin >> testCases;
    assert(1 <= testCases && testCases <= 100000);
    while (testCases--) {
        long long n, k;
        bool fYes = false;
        cin >> n >> k;
        assert(1 <= n && n <= 1000000000);
        assert(1 <= k && k <= 1000000000000000000LL);
        for(long long d = 1; d < 3; d++) {
            long long q = k - d * n * (n - 1) / 2;
            if (q <= 0 || (q % n != 0)) {
                continue;
            }
            fYes = true;
        }
        if (fYes)
            cout << "Yes" << endl;
        else
            cout << "No" << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
